name: Instructions: Hydroculus Resonance Stone
desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Hydroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Hydroculi.

value.text: Learn to craft Hydroculus Resonance Stone.

value.name: Hydroculus Resonance Stone
value.desc:
A talisman that can be used in Fontaine to search for nearby Hydroculi.

A curious talisman that possesses similar properties to the Hydro Statues of The Seven. It seems to be able to detect the Elemental Flow of Hydroculi.

Oculi are by nature scattered pieces of power belonging to the Statues of The Seven. Returning them to the Statues is therefore the reasonable, right, and lawful thing to do.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Romaritime Flower
customize.desc: An ethereal and elegant blue flower. Its tender petals are elastic and water-absorbent, making it the ideal raw material for various daily necessities.

customize.name: Rainbow Rose
customize.desc: A delicate and tender pink flower. Despite their name, Rainbow Roses are essentially more akin to Lilies.

customize.name: Crystal Chunk
customize.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.
